meanings.definition: A person employed to manage a household and perform cleaning and other domestic tasks.
meanings.sent1: The housekeeper tidied up the living room every morning.
meanings.sent2: My mom hired a housekeeper to help with the chores.
meanings.sent3: The housekeeper accidentally vacuumed up a sock!
meanings.sent4: She was the housekeeper of our hearts, always keeping things in order.
meanings.sent5: The diligent housekeeper scrubbed every corner until it sparkled.

meanings.definition: A device or product used to keep a house clean and organized.
meanings.sent1: The robotic housekeeper swept the floors while we were out.
meanings.sent2: I bought a new housekeeper to help with the spring cleaning.
meanings.sent3: The high-tech housekeeper beeped happily as it worked.
meanings.sent4: The housekeeper of a vacuum whirred to life, sucking up dirt effortlessly.
meanings.sent5: This magical housekeeper could make any mess disappear in seconds.
